quotes.text:
Simple, clear purpose and principles give rise to complex
      and intelligent behaviour. Complex rules and regulations give
      rise to simple and stupid behaviour.
quotes.author: Lee Dock

quotes.text: Don't let your tools dominate the message.
quotes.author: Platon

quotes.text:
Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing
      which ones to keep
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.text:
Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add,
      but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.text:
If you always do what you’ve always done,
      you’ll always get what you’ve always got.
quotes.author: Henry Ford
